aboutParagraph: I'm a junior web developer with a background in gameplay programming from my studies at a videogame school, where I specialized in C# and C++. Transitioning into web development, I've built a solid foundation in JavaScript, React, and SQL, and have recently dived into React and Next.js. My journey reflects a strong passion for learning and adapting to new technologies, pushing me to constantly expand my skill set and explore the latest in web development. This curiosity has led me to not only learning the fundamentals but also to experiment with advanced frameworks like React and Next.js, aiming to create seamless, efficient web experiences.
